creditline: Gift of Dr. Jenifer Lloyd and Dr. John Dunne, David and Susan Plimpton, and Patricia Connelly in honor of Peace Projects Everywhere
inscription: On the top-facing sheet of one stack, printed in black ink: 58,220
medium: Concept and design plans for a gallery installation of 60 stacks of heavy white paper (one sheet with numerals printed in black) contained in 60 transparent acrylic boxes set on a white wooden platform
title: Remembering Other
